name: Kill or Heal
description:
Playing as a surgeon, you must transplant organs to patients to heal them. But your boss want you to kill and smuggle organs. Now you must balance between your Fear from mafia and your Guilt for killing and smuggling organs.

Global Game Jam 2022 entry.
Theme: Duality
Jam Site: Avagames

Developers:
Alireza Mayahi pour - Programing
Mojtaba Pourfatemi - Game Design/Programing
Mostafa Hosseini - Art and Animations

Music:
Drag Race by TrackTribe

Tools:
JuiceFX
Paint.net

Fonts:
SpecialElite
Carnevalee Freakshow
Bohemian Typewriter
Aisha Script
Palatino Linotype
